titleInfo.title: B'nai B'rith Night at Bears Stadium

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 5 x 7 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''B'nai B'rith Night, Bears Stadium 7/21/52, Mag - B'nai B'rith - June 25 - pp. 16-17, #406, B'nai B'rith 171, (Sally) Spivak.''

mods.abstract: Several men and boys with some girls are seated in the Bears Stadium cheering at a B'nai B'rith Night. The image was printed in the B'nai B'rith magazine on June 25 [year unknown].
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
